statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_profiles SET experience = 500, game_id = 2 WHERE player_id = 3
UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 10, experience = experience + 100 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_profiles SET experience = 500, game_id = 2 WHERE player_name = 'John'
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level = 10 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_statistics SET deaths = 5, assists = 3 WHERE player_id = 456 AND game_id = 789
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level = 10, player_experience = 500 WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_statistics SET kills = 20, assists = 5, deaths = 2 WHERE player_id = 456 AND game_id = 789
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET email='newemail@example.com', avatar_url='update.jpg' WHERE player_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE GameStats SET score=150, level=5 WHERE player_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND game_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', avatar_url = 'new_avatar.png' WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE GameStats SET level = 5, score = 1000 WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND game_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE PlayerProgress SET current_level=10, last_played='2023-05-15' WHERE player_id=2 AND game_id=3;
UPDATE PlayerProfiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE PlayerStatistics SET score = 500, level = 10 WHERE player_id = 1 AND game_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = 10, total_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE game_levels SET level_difficulty = 'Medium', level_name = 'Intermediate' WHERE level_id = 5;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_location = 'New York' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = 10, total_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 1;
